description:
As Vegeta, Krillin, and Gohan look on, Goku easily deflects the attacks of Jeice and Burter, two of the Force’s fiercest warriors.  Could Goku have become what Vegeta thought was only a legend: a Super Saiyan?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Aka to Ao no Lightning Ball! Jeese to Butta ga Gokuu o Osou
Songoku aux prises avec les ennemis
บอลแสงสีแดงและน้ำเงิน! บาตะและจีสเข้าจู่โจมโกคู
赤と青の光球[ライトニングボール]! ジースとバータが悟空を襲う
